title: Leading mobile messengers in the U.S. 2019 , by users
yAxis: Number of monthly unique users in millions
summary: The Leading mobile Platform in the U.S. 2019 was Platform WhatsApp , who made 106.4 monthly .
The most mobile Platform was Discord_-_Chat_for_Games , with just 1.48 monthly .

In second place was Platform Snapchat with 45.98 monthly ; third place went to Platform Facebook_Messenger with 106.4 monthly ; fourth place went to Platform WeChat with 1.48 monthly and fifth place went to Platform Messenger_by_Google , who was 17.46 monthly .
gold: As of September 2019 , Facebook Messenger was the most popular mobile messenger app in the United States with 106.4 million unique U.S. users . Snapchat ranked second with an audience of almost 45.98 million users . As of that period , Facebook Messenger had a 57 percent mobile audience reach in the United States .
